title: A christian familiar comfort and incouragement vnto all English subiects, not to dismaie at the Spanish threats Whereunto is added an admonition to all English Papists, who openly or couertly couet a change. With requisite praiers to almightie God for the preseruation of our queene and countrie. By the most vnworthie I.N.
author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?
publisher: [By T. Scarlet and J. Orwin] for J. B[rome],
notes: Printers' and publisher's names from STC.
First three quires printed by Scarlet; the rest by J. Orwin.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
